decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby approved shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (Drawing No: 101, received 10 June 2014) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby approved shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - Prior to construction works, appropriate root and/or tree protection methodologies shall be implemented at the base of the two x trees in the front garden.

Condition : 5 - The hardstanding area shall be constructed in accordance with The Highways Agency's Policy and Guidance. This can be found on Page 4 of the Hounslow Highways Application form for a Vehicle Crossover / Extension.
description: Landscaping of front garden with hard and soft materials along with the increase in parking provision for the residential units on the site.
